description: Environment variable definitions for EmergencyResponseCoordination. Values are set per-environment (Dev/Test/Prod).

variables.description: GUID of the default agency for new records. Set per environment.
GUID of the default jurisdiction. Set per environment.
Default map center latitude for canvas app.
Default map center longitude for canvas app.
Default zoom level (1-20) for map controls.
Set to 'true' to enable cost fields on mutual aid requests. Some agencies don't track costs.
Number of days to retain PHI data before archival. Compliance-driven.
When an incident's patient count reaches this number, the flow auto-flags seo_isMCI = true. Configurable per deployment.
Number of days before a mutual aid agreement's expiration date to include it in the daily digest email.
Distribution list or mailbox for supervisor alerts (MCI, alarm level changes, mutual aid requests, command transfers). Set per environment.
Recipient for Power Automate flow failure notifications. Typically a shared mailbox monitored by the admin team.
GUID of the Dataverse system user (service account) that owns elevated flows. Must have seo_SystemAdmin role. Used for flows that manage BUs, teams, and cross-BU sharing.
How often the Responder Mobile app updates the unit's GPS coordinates in Dataverse (in seconds). Lower values increase location accuracy but consume more battery and API calls.
How often the Responder Mobile app syncs its offline cache with Dataverse (in minutes). Lower values provide fresher data but increase network usage.
GUID of the default dashboard for the Dispatch Console model-driven app landing page. Set per environment after dashboard deployment.
GUID of the GCC Power BI workspace where datasets and reports are published. Set per environment.
How often Power BI datasets refresh from Dataverse (in hours). Lower values provide fresher analytics but consume more gateway resources.
NFPA 1710 first-unit response time benchmark in minutes. Default 6.33 = 6 minutes 20 seconds. Used in compliance % calculations in Power BI reports.
